EmailTemplate.name: 2019.10.14 - Prelogin - Monthly Offer #3.Prelogin - Monthly Offer #3
EmailTemplate.subject: Sit Comfortably With 10% OFF Ergonomics
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Say ‘goodbye’ to neck and back pain with one of our top performing ergo chairs, plus save 10% OFF** when you spend over $100. Use code 1910SAVE
$200.04 $246.83 Offices To Go Yoho Task Chair Shop Now $256.37 $316.48 Offices To Go Ibex Mid-Back Task Chair Shop Now $184.07 $230.09 Horizon Activ Low-Back Tilter Chair Shop Now Free Shipping In Stock Clearance Deal Centre Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx]]> Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx]]> Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx]]> View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1 866 391‑8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions]]> or call 1 866 391‑8111 for details.
**Must sign in to your account in order to use the promo code. Offer valid at grandandtoy.com <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com]]> only. Enter promo code 1910SAVE at checkout. Not valid on bottled water, services, printing, or special orders. Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Offer not valid on prior purchases or for credit card payments. No cash or credit back. Open to Canadian residents only. Cash value .001¢. Offer expires October 31, 2019.; © 2019 Grand & Toy Limited
